dct_title_s: New York City Survey Control Points 2004
dct_description_sm: The "Survey_control_point" dataset is a point representation of New York City monuments, GPS points and analytical points used for the triangulation of the New York City Base Map.
dct_creator_sm: New York City Department of Information Technology and Telecommunications
dct_subject_sm: Survey control point, Monument, GPS Point, Analytical Point.
